Package com.hub

Class HubController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hub.HubController
  • @RestController
@EnableScheduling
public class HubController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the I/O class for the Hub Application This class connects and tracks all of the servers' information Also searches, sets, and check on the leader of the network

      • HubController

        public HubController​(HubRepository repository)
        Sets up the initial steps of the Hub Application
        Parameters:
        repository - the file designated the Spring Boot as the resilient repo storing the network's servers' info

    • Method Detail

      • mapSetUp

        @PostConstruct
private void mapSetUp()
        Only once the hub has started can it repopulate the map in memory from the resilient repo

      • findAndSendLeader

        protected java.lang.String findAndSendLeader()
        Searches the network for a viable leader and sets the leader for the network
        Returns:
        String containing the ID of the leader

      • addServer

        @RateLimiter(name="DDoS-stopper")
@PostMapping("/hub")
protected java.lang.Long addServer​(@RequestBody
                                   java.lang.String json)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Add new server to the network
        Parameters:
        json - String in JSON format which contains the new server's information
        Returns:
        Long which is the newly generated ID to be given to the server
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for any failures that may occur when sending HTTP Requests

      • sendLeader

        private void sendLeader()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Sends out updated leader to all servers in the network
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for any failures that may occur when sending HTTP Requests

      • randomlyCheck

        @Scheduled(fixedDelay=60000L)
protected void randomlyCheck()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs health checks on the leader
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for incorrect URI formation

      • getMap

        @RateLimiter(name="DDoS-stopper")
@GetMapping("/hub")
protected java.lang.String getMap()
        Returns:
        JSON formatted HashMap of the network, e.g. {ID: address}

      • getLeader

        @RateLimiter(name="DDoS-stopper")
@GetMapping("/hub/leader")
protected java.lang.String getLeader​(@RequestHeader(name="id")
                                     java.lang.String id)
        Returns the current leader if it exists If there isn't a leader & the server calling this method has an ID assigned to it, make it the leader and return If neither is true, return null, as there isn't a leader
        Parameters:
        id - String of the requesting server's ID
        Returns:
        leader if there is one set, otherwise null

      • parseAddressFromJsonString

        private java.lang.String parseAddressFromJsonString​(java.lang.String json)
        Parses a server's address from a JSON formatted String
        Parameters:
        json - String in JSON format containing a server's address
        Returns:
        String of the server's address

      • storeServerInfoInString

        private java.lang.String storeServerInfoInString​(java.lang.Long id,
                                                 java.lang.String address)
        Convert a server's info into a String formatted as a JSON
        Parameters:
        id - server's ID in the network
        address - server's address
        Returns:
        String formatted as a JSON containing the server's info

      • addNewServerToAllServers

        private void addNewServerToAllServers​(java.lang.String serverInfo)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a new server's info to all of the server's on the network
        Parameters:
        serverInfo - String formatted as a JSON containing the server's info
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for any failures that may occur when sending HTTP Requests

      • updateAddress

        @RateLimiter(name="DDoS-stopper")
@PutMapping("/hub")
protected void updateAddress​(@RequestBody
                             java.lang.String json)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Update the address on a server already existing on the network and send to all of the server's the update
        Parameters:
        json - String formatted as a JSON containing the server's info
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for any failures that may occur when sending HTTP Requests

      • removeServerFromNetwork

        @RateLimiter(name="DDoS-stopper")
@DeleteMapping("/hub/{serverID}")
protected void removeServerFromNetwork​(@PathVariable
                                       java.lang.Long serverID)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Remove a server from the network permanently
        Parameters:
        serverID - Long of the server's ID
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for any failures that may occur when sending HTTP Requests
